metadata.title: CVE-2017-11107 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
phpLDAPadmin through 1.2.3 has XSS in htdocs/entry_chooser.php via theform, element, rdn, or container parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpldapadmin - 1.2.2-5ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpldapadmin package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-5ubuntu1.2').
